name: You Are A Lemon
description:
Put together in Game Maker 1.4 in an afternoon. I wanted to prove to myself that I could do it, and so I did. I referenced nothing explicitly from the bird game it was inspired by and the art/gameplay shouldn't be identical.

Release Features:

 - You are a lemon
 - Hop through the pipes by pressing spacebar
 - The game keeps track of your score for you so you don't have to
 - Highscores are persistent between sessions
 - The game goes on forever
 - The download is a standalone exe, which means it shouldn't need to be installed

Disclaimer:
Since it's an unsigned .exe in the zip file, Windows might think it's fishy when it's actually not. However, no parties involved in the creation of this software can be held liable for how it affects your system, whether intentionally or unintentionally. Nobody can control what you install on your computer except for you or the owner, so play responsibly.
